A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: a pile that spits in the face of loyal fans having the attitude of i will do all i can to unravel the story I was trusted to continue in the tradition of those before me. Stunning to look at and view but an erupting volcano is also a majestic and beautiful thing to see\, the point being it's still rather destructive. Pod race 2.0 was a waste along with that entire plot line\, space leia lame and do you think the pilot who shot got force ass kicked by kilo when they landed? where was that? I think the thing that annoyed me most was the whole laze fare attitude. I did appreciate the nod to the original Yoda and R2's playing of the holo image from a new hope.
